## CircularDependencyError.toJSON() method

Converts the error to JSON format for logging purposes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toJSON(): {
        name: string;
        message: string;
        dependencyChain: string[];
        circularPath: string[];
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ name: string; message: string; dependencyChain: string\[\]; circularPath: string\[\]; }

{<!-- -->Object<!-- -->} JSON representation of the error with dependency details.
